ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND($Label.Disable_all_validations_from_lead == "false" /*Added by Prashant to control disabling all validations together*/,IF(OR(RW_Apply_Unregistered_Broker__c,!ISBLANK(RW_Broker__c)),AND(!ISPICKVAL(LeadSource,"Channel Partner"),!ISPICKVAL(LeadSource,"Temp Channel Partner"))/*Added by Prashant to add Temp CP condition as well*/,false))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Broker Details were filled only on Channel Partner Source
